Index.title: Camera QR Reader
Index.scanReadyDesc: Place a QR code in front of your camera to automatically detect and read its content.
Index.guideScanDesc: Use your webcam to scan QR codes instantly. URLs will be detected automatically, and you can copy content with a single click.
Index.guideGenDesc: Type any text or link to create a high-quality QR code. You can download it as a PNG image for sharing or printing.
Index.guideShareDesc: Easily transfer long text, WiFi passwords, or links from your computer to your mobile device by scanning the screen.
Index.iosDesc: Unlock the full potential of your device with our exclusive Shortcuts ecosystem.
Index.shortcut1Desc: Quickly scan QR codes from this website and auto-save content to your iPhone clipboard.
Index.shortcut2Desc: Convert your iPhone clipboard text into a QR code instantly for this website to scan.
